title: Create a Git Stash
description: In this challenge, you will learn how to use the Git stash feature to save your current changes before switching to a different branch, and then apply the stashed changes later when needed.

meta.title: Create a Git Stash: Mastering Version Control with Ease
meta.description: Discover the power of Git stash to seamlessly manage your code changes and switch between branches effortlessly.
meta.keywords: branch management, version control, code changes, git labs, stash, git, git playground

verify.name: Verify for successful saving
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
